protocol_name: 16S Illumina Primer Plate Aliquoting (working plates 5µM Forw & Rev)
protocol_name_html: 16S Illumina Primer Plate Aliquoting (working plates 5µM Forw & Rev)
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"efd8c","text":"The following protocol outlines aliquoting resuspended primers, stored at 100µM in stock plates, into working primer plates at a conentration of 5µM for both forward (barcoded) and reverse primers, using the epMotion 5075. The Knigh Lab stores primer combos premixed in working primer plates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"24ctq","text":"Please wear at least the minimum required personal protective equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eojnc","text":"Ensure that all necessary kit components are available as well as user-supplied consumables.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o71v","text":"Remove nuclease and nucleotide contamination from work surfaces and instruments prior to starting using an appropriate solution, such as RNase AWAY™ (Thermo Scientific™ catalogue: 700511), followed by wiping with 70% to 100% molecular biology grade ethanol to remove additional contaminants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials.reagent_name: ep T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 20 - 300 µL w/ filter

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2g5ll","text":"(4) IDT 96-Well Resuspended Primer Plates (100 µM)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bncfg","text":"(1) IDT Lyophilized Reverse Primer in vial. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k66h","text":"(4) 96-Well Eppendorf twin.tec plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1claf","text":"(4) ep T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 1 - 50 µL w/ filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o2aq","text":"(1) ep T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 20 -300 µL w/ filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3skm1","text":"(1) epMotion Reservoir 30 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"42uo1","text":"Resuspend Reverse Primer from lyophilized sample vial to a final concentration of 100 \u00b5M","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B07AB620D87711E89129C93F65877FAB","id":676811,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Prepare reagents"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"483ad","text":"In a sterile 30mL reservoir, add 15,840 \u00b5L of PCR Clean Water and 880 \u00b5L of Reverse Primer (100 \u00b5M) to make (4) 96-Well primer working plates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3dfoq","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"emppt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3E1C88E0D87911E89129C93F65877FAB","amount":"15840","unit":1,"label":"PCR Clean Water","step_guid":"142DC860D87811E89129C93F65877FAB"}},{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"75572D10D87911E891DF73F57BE52EF6","amount":"880","unit":1,"label":"Reverse Primer (100\u00b5M)","step_guid":"142DC860D87811E89129C93F65877FAB"}}],"guid":"142DC860D87811E89129C93F65877FAB","id":676812,"previous_id":676811,"previous_guid":"B07AB620D87711E89129C93F65877FAB","section":"Prepare reagents"}

Motion Racks 1 - 50 \u00b5L w\/ filter in slots A2-A5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ce605","text":"Place (1) box of ep. T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 20 - 300 \u00b5L w\/ filter in slot B5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"175o7","text":"Place (4) 96-Well plates of resuspended primers (100\u00b5M) from IDT in slots B1-B4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"akdkb","text":"Place (4) 96-Well twin.tec plates in slots C1-C4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7ldgm","text":"Place 30 mL reservoir with reverse primer (5.26 \u00b5M) in slot 1 of the Resevoir Rack and place Rack in slot C5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":181,"guid":"29DDE310D87911E89129C93F65877FAB","align":null,"brand":"Eppendorf","sku":"5075000962","specifications":"","file_id":null,"file_icon":null,"file_name":null,"image_id":null,"s3_image_name":null,"s3_file_name":null,"can_edit":true,"step_guid":"1DC25E80D87911E89129C93F65877FAB","image_name":null,"link":null,"type":"Liquid Handling","name":"epMotion 5075"}},{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"31741","guid":"C3DCA5A0D87911E891DF73F57BE52EF6","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8973mm6.png","placeholder":"","original_name":"Capture6.PNG","mime":"image\/png","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false}}],"guid":"1DC25E80D87911E89129C93F65877FAB","id":676893,"previous_id":676892,"previous_guid":"2D9A0B40D87A11E884A4D5E390A284C8","section":"Setup epMotion automation platform."}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a1r8","text":"Remove box lids and plate foils and execute protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"be7li","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"kqjf","text":"(Protocol must be imported to epBlue software prior to attempting to execute it. epBlue 40.6 or later)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":81,"length":20,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bbpqq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"a92bf","text":"The automated protocol transfers 38\u00b5L of reverse primer (5.26\u00b5M) into the (4) different 96-Well Primer Plates using the multidispense feature of the epBlue software. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cha85","text":"Then it transfer 2\u00b5L of barcoded forward primers (100\u00b5M) from IDT stock plates into the (4) different 96-Well Primer Plates (working plates)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"90kss","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"31742","guid":"BD9098E0D87A11E884A4D5E390A284C8","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8983mm6.export6","placeholder":"\/img\/extensions\/file.png","original_name":"Application_4_5uM_Primer_40ul_181003_105836.export6"}}],"guid":"8703C0E0D87A11E884A4D5E390A284C8","id":676895,"previous_guid":"1DC25E80D87911E89129C93F65877FAB","section":"Execute automated protocol"}
